testcase.classname: Visualize options select one and learn more about the trip
testcase.name: As a user I want to choose one sail and learn more about the trip,
testcase.system-out: Given User lands on carnival page...........................................passed When User closes offer modal................................................passed And User closes cookie banner...............................................passed And User clicks on Sail To filter...........................................passed And User clicks on The Bahamas button.......................................passed And User clicks on Duration to filter.......................................passed And User clicks on six to nine Days button..................................passed And User clicks on search cruises...........................................passed Then User lands on cruise search page.......................................passed When User clicks on a trip..................................................passed Then User lands on itinerary page...........................................passed Then User verify additional info about every day............................passed Then User verify book now is placed into the page...........................passed
